title: McMaster briefs U.N. Security Council on North Korea
text:
McMaster briefs U.N. Security Council on North Korea 5:23am IST - 01:05 
After briefing the U.N. Security Council on North Korea, U.S. National Security Adviser H.R. McMaster said they unified in being “optimistic” about possible talks between Donald Trump and Kim Jong-un, but determined to maintain pressure on Pyongyang. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
